content: Dealers in the Northeast region report increased demand for hybrid sedans, limited interest in diesel trucks.
Southwest dealers note strong SUV sales. Request more AWD variants for mountainous areas.
Dealership complaint: shortage of EV Crossovers. Waitlist extends to 3 months.
Consumers want improved infotainment in the EcoSedan. Suggest adding larger touchscreen.
metadata: Survey group: 50 drivers, top complaint: 7-inch screen too small

content: Pickups remain popular among rural dealers. Diesel option sees moderate interest, but cost concerns.
